description: This file provides utilities for generating PowerPoint presentations using the pptxgenjs library, including functions to create slides with images and text, and handle downloading the generated PPTX file with fallback mechanisms.

methods.name: downloadBlob(blob, fileName)
methods.description: Creates a temporary URL for a Blob and triggers a download through an anchor element, with automatic cleanup to prevent memory leaks.

methods.name: generatePptx(slides, fileNameTitle = 'Presentation')
methods.description: Generates a PowerPoint presentation with slides containing images and optional titles or captions, then attempts to save it via pptx.writeFile or falls back to a Blob download if necessary.

methods.name: sanitize(name)
methods.description: Sanitizes a string to be used as a filename by replacing non-word characters with underscores.
